reviews.review_msg: Very good prof, caring and easy to talk to. Lectures clear and fun. Recommend.

Don't believe the hype, his English is perfect, ain't nothing wrong with it. As far as his teaching is considered, he is crystal clear. Also, don't forget to attend tutorials, they are essential for getting an A

His english is both unclear and hard to make out what he is saying. His assignments are alright, but mid-terms and the final exams are a little too tough to do in the allocated time. His lecture notes are ok; has some examples to guide you along.
308 is as easy as upper maths get.  Course pace is slow due to proofs (of which a good deal aren't really necessary).  I skipped most lectures and relied mainly on textbook.

I don't know why he is teaching math even though he is in cs. I can't understand his lectures, I can't even understand his English or his writing. He seems to know the material but can't teach. Assignments are hard as well.
